title: Get Creative Set Request
description: Request parameters for retrieving a creative set. Used by both orchestrators and seller agents to fetch creative set details and ad tags.

creative_set_id.description: Unique identifier for the creative set

format_ids.description: Filter to specific formats. Creative agent may adapt/generate missing formats if possible.

include_previews.description: Include preview_url and thumbnail_url for each creative

include_ad_tags.description: Include ad_tag field with full markup. Set to false for metadata-only responses.
